Jayni’s Soccer Adventures: Health Lesson 1

Hi, friends! Soccer has started!

I’m super excited to start soccer season! Just to make sure I’m super safe while playing soccer, my family doctor taught me how to protect my body from injury.

Our bodies require certain amounts of calcium for bone strength. I try to eat as healthy as possible to keep my energy level. Vitamins and minerals are essential for our body to maintain balance.

Here are few questions I recently discovered answers to. How many can you answer correctly?
